```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, here)
```

```{r}
data <- read_csv(here("GitHub_Workshop_Mats", "OA_activitydat_20190302_BIOL3207.csv"))

glimpse(data)
# check for spelling errors by looking at unique values within columns
unique(data$species)
unique(data$treatment)

tidydata <- data %>%
  # select out useless columns
  select(-c(1, loc, comment)) %>%
  # remove all rows containing at least one missing value
  na.omit() %>%
  group_by(treatment, species) %>%
  summarise(act_mean = mean(activity),
            act_sd = sd(activity),
            sl_mean = mean(sl),
            sl_sd = sd(sl),
            samples = n())
```
